description: A crew of children from Ruluka Island who pretended to be pirates fifty years ago. They were trapped in the Rainbow Mist while fleeing from Wetton's attack and remained children due to time distortion. Later became Marines.

ship.name: Stolen Pirate Ship (Tarielishin)
ship.description: The ship stolen from Wetton's pirate crew during their escape

keyMoments.title: Pumpkin Pirates Reveal Themselves
keyMoments.description: The crew reveals themselves to the Straw Hats in Ape's Concert, introducing themselves as the Pumpkin Pirates and threatening intruders.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance and introduction of the crew to the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Crew Formation
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals how the children formed the Pumpkin Pirates on Ruluka Island, dreaming of becoming real pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the origins and motivations of the crew.

keyMoments.title: Escape into Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: The crew steals Wetton's ship and sails into the Rainbow Mist while being chased by Wetton and Ian, becoming trapped for fifty years.
keyMoments.significance: Defining moment that traps the crew in Ape's Concert and separates them from normal time.

achievements: Successfully repelled Wetton's attack on Ruluka Island
Survived fifty years in the Rainbow Mist
Only known pirate crew to join the Marines (future)
trivia: The crew members remained children for fifty years due to time distortion in the Rainbow Mist
They eventually become the same Marines who chased the Straw Hats to Ruluka Island, creating an ontological paradox
The only known pirate crew in One Piece to entirely join the Marines
Anime-only crew that does not appear in the manga

description: A pirate crew led by Captain Wetton that attacked and burned down Ruluka Island fifty years ago. After the attack, Wetton retired from piracy and became mayor of the same island he once destroyed.

ship.name: Tarielishin
ship.description: The pirate ship with a red bull's head as the front-piece, stolen by the Pumpkin Pirates during their escape

keyMoments.title: Attack on Ruluka Island
keyMoments.description: Wetton and his crew attacked and burned down Ruluka Island, forcing the Pumpkin Pirates to flee by stealing their ship.
keyMoments.significance: The attack that led to the Pumpkin Pirates being trapped in the Rainbow Mist and Wetton eventually becoming mayor.

keyMoments.title: Wetton and Ian Chase the Children
keyMoments.description: Wetton and Ian pursue the Pumpkin Pirates who stole their ship, with Ian becoming trapped in the Rainbow Mist alongside the children.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's pursuit of the children that led to Ian's fifty-year imprisonment.

achievements: Successfully conquered and burned Ruluka Island
Captain Wetton became mayor of Ruluka Island after retiring from piracy
trivia: The crew's ship, Tarielishin, features a red bull's head matching Wetton's cane
Wetton's bounty was 14,800,000 Belly during his piracy days
Ian was trapped in the Rainbow Mist for fifty years while Wetton became mayor
Anime-only crew that does not appear in the manga
